summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4795 for the improvement of Fremont Avenue from North 36th Street and North 50th Street; by the installation of a street lighting system under Ordinance No. 55440 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
